thread.section_title: Brian Gavin Diamonds Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Brian Gavin Diamonds | briangavindiamonds.com
thread.title: Bob Emer
thread.title_full: Brian Gavin Diamonds reviewed by Bob Emer

author: Bob Emer
title: Bob Emer
text:
Choosing an online vendor for a significant purchase like a five stone diamond ring could have been a harrowing experience. But as luck would would have it I chose Brian Gavin. The entire transaction, from the selection of the stones , the ring and the payment process could not have gone smoother, thanks in large part to Jamie Carson.
Recently we purchased a set of earrings that didn't work for my wife and BGD's return process was handled every bit as efficiently and pleasantly as our purchases have been.
In brief we have been so impressed that on our recommendation our son purchased a beautiful engagement ring from Brian Gavin Diamonds.
